name: Table Formatting
description: Tests the model's ability to create and format tables effectively in presentations

prompts.text: Create a presentation comparing three competing products. Include a well-formatted comparison table with at least 5 features/criteria as rows and the three products as columns. The table should have clear headers, consistent column widths, proper alignment (text left-aligned, numbers right-aligned), and visual separation between rows. Use appropriate formatting to highlight the winning product for each criterion.

Create a presentation about quarterly financial results. Include a complex data table showing revenue, expenses, and profit margins across 4 quarters, with year-over-year comparison. The table should include proper formatting for currency values, percentages, proper header structure with merged cells for categories, and appropriate use of borders and shading to improve readability.
expected_elements: Effective use of merged cells for headers

structure_clarity.description: Clarity and effectiveness of table structure

data_formatting.description: Proper formatting of data types (text, numbers, etc.)

content_alignment.description: Appropriate alignment of different content types
